sentence: Asked by host Bash about Taylor Greene's appearance at the racist get-together in Orlando along with Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) the Utah Republican didn't mince words when host Bash quoted a statement made by Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) that attacked the Georgia lawmaker.
author: Tom Boggioni
title: 'I have morons on my team': Mitt Romney questions Marjorie Taylor Greene's 'IQ' in brutal CNN rant

sentence: Yesterday, Cheney tweeted “As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist , anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling.
author: Objectivist Staff
title: Mitt Romney Bashes “Pro-Russian” Republicans on CNN; “Almost Treasonous”

sentence: Republican Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Paul Gosar of Arizona received criticism for speaking at the America First Political Action Conference in Orlando, Florida.
author: Alexandra Meeks
title: 5 things to know for Feb. 28: Ukraine, EPA, Covid-19, State of the Union, North Korea

sentence: In court documents, Alexander’s lawyers have said he told congressional investigators that he remembers having “a few phone conversations” with Rep. Paul Gosar, R-Ariz., and had exchanged some text messages with Rep. Mo Brooks, R-Ala., in the run-up to the Jan. 6 rallies.
